beluchaga

2022. The word beluchaga originates from me. It is a nonsense word I made up to try and fit most of the unique letterform elements when brainstorming typeface forms. The typeface went through many blocky, heavy, and soft forms before landing on this smooth but not squishy form. In this spiral-bound specimen, I created a small dictionary to hold other nonsensical, made-up words, with their own definitions.
